column1: Liz got James his job as a stable boy
James is obsessed with appeasing the Colonel
Liz used to be in a relationship with James
Liz thinks something suspicious is happening at the mansion
Colonel doesn't like James hanging around with his daughter.
Violet and James are together a lot
Colonel doesn't know about some rooms in the manor
Violet has strange scars on her wrist
The manor is a headquarter to a dark cult
Violet is a member of the cult
There is a cult ritual tonight to bring back Violet's mother
The player is the sacrifice for that ritual
The Colonel is disappointed in Thomas
Thomas is afraid of losing the Colonel
Thomas knows Violet is running a cult
James doesn't like talking about the manor
Violet resents Colonel for leaving when she was younger
Violet's mother died while Colonel was away
James is a member of the cult
Violet has been distant since Colonel returned home
Colonel asks the player to break up James and Violet
Convince Liz to get over James and date someone else.
Find evidence of Violet's misdoings by obtaining her diary.
Get Baroness to like Liz enough to hire her.
Get James to come back to Liz.
Get Thomas to stop protecting the Colonel by ruining Thomas's family bond with his father.
Get Violet to like the Colonel more.
Help Thomas repair his relationship with James.
James wants to find out how serious Violet is about the cult and asks for her diary.
Liz wants to find out what's going on with the house and asks or Violet's diary.
James and Liz are now dating and Liz is super happy!
Liz is mad that the player for making the Baroness dislike Liz so much.
Quest completed as requested. Broke up James and Violet.
Liz is mad that the player for taking James away from her.
Wooed James instead of just breaking them up.
Asked you to break them up but you made them elope.
James now free of Violet and happy with Liz helps free you from Violet's evil plans.
Realizing her love for the player and her distaste for her brother Violet is convinced to sacrifice Thomas instead of the player.
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with James
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Liz
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Violet
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Colonel Baroness
Sadly having made no friends in the manor the player is sacrificed to raise Violet's mother. Unfortunately since the player dies they don't even get to see if the sacrifice worked.
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with James Baroness
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Colonel Liz Baroness
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Colonel
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Violet Colonel
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with James Colonel Liz
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Violet Colonel Thomas
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Thomas
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with James Thomas
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Baroness
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Liz Baroness
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with James Colonel
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Colonel Thomas Baroness
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Colonel Thomas
Violet realizes she loves James more than she'd let herself believe and she gives up the cult to go elope with him.
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Violet James
The player's strong ties allow them to escape with Thomas Baroness
